items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript speech-to-text converter that transforms voice to text in real-time. Built with the Web Speech API, this beginner-friendly project demonstrates browser-based voice recognition with a clean interface. Perfect for learning modern web APIs while creating a practical accessibility tool.
items.title: devhimal/audio-text-converter: A lightweight JavaScript speech-to-text converter that transforms voice to text in real-time. Built with the Web Speech API, this beginner-friendly project demonstrates browser-based voice recognition with a clean interface. Perfect for learning modern web APIs while creating a practical accessibility tool.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
